entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-10-07
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • crossgen/llc --help is malformed #76770
    8.0.0
  • Update WebAssembly Browser and Console App templates to display localhost app URLs instead of 127.0.0.1 #76769
  • Implement source generator for proposed System.Runtime.InteropServices.Marshalling.GeneratedComInterfaceAttribute #76767
    8.0.0
  • .NET 6 Alpine container rarely fails in FileSystemEnumerator on HostBuilder.Build() #76763
  • Build fails with "eng/common/tools.sh: line 474: 537 Segmentation fault" #76759
  • `ActivityListener` callbacks `ActivityStarted` and `ActivityStopped` intermittently triggered twice for same `Activity` #76757
  • outerloop legs failing to detect `dotnet` #76755
  • Emit Contention/Start and Contention/Stop Events on Native AOT Apps #76754
    8.0.0
  • Chrome debugger tests timeout #76750
  • An overwritten ToString method does not show the content of an item in Blazor WASM (while DebuggerDisplay works now) #76748
  • OpenXml throws a different exception given identical code and similar build configuration for two distinct solutions. Why? #76744
  • Exception Type not loged to EventLog when a Exception crashes the application #76741
  • WebAssembly vectorization perf on interpreter: observations/questions #76738
    8.0.0
  • Mutex.TryOpenExisting intermittently throws IOException #76736
    7.0.0
  • String == ReadOnlySpan<char> is FALSE; Really Bad Design and Needs to be FIX #76735
  • Possible to detect AOT mode during runtime? #76739

Closed

  • [release/3.1] CI failure: System.Globalization.Tests.IdnMappingIdnaConformanceTests.GetUnicode_Invalid #76651
  • List<T>.AddRange with erroneous input has inconsistent behavior #76116
    8.0.0
  • dotnet command line argument --additional-deps (Windows and mac) #75670
    8.0.0
  • Tar: filesizes >= 8Gb are truncated on extraction due to incorrect size being written #76563
    8.0.0
  • Why is `CCKeyDerivationPBKDF` not used in non-macOS Apple platforms? #76684
    8.0.0
  • An overwritten ToString method does not show the content of an item in Blazor WASM (while DebuggerDisplay works now) #76749
  • Git error when checking out repo #74327
    Future
  • [API Proposal]: jagged arrays should be allowed to be initialized with second length #76742
  • [Regions] Avoid declaring an object cannot fit in a segment if we already have committed space for it #55684
    7.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Remove more PAL exports for `wprintf` `wscanf` funcs #76771
    area-VM-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Correct error messages for CoreCLR Win32 PAL uses in CoreLib #76768
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices
  • Fold primitive-typed access to promoted structs in local morph and forbid mismatched struct assignments #76766
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • SPMI: Return recorded base instrumentation data address #76765
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add ReadOnly{Observable}Collection/Dictionary.Empty #76764
    area-System.Collections, new-api-needs-documentation, 8.0.0
  • Enable visual styles for host error dialog via activation context #76762
    area-Host
  • [wasm-mt] When workers resize the heap, instanceof SharedArrayBuffer may be false #76760
    NO-MERGE, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript
  • [release/7.0] Properly handle filesizes larger than 8 Gb #76756
    Servicing-approved, area-System.IO, 7.0.0
  • Throw ObjectDisposedException for AES-CCM on Android #76753
    area-System.Security, os-android
  • Add basic test for `PrintDocument.Print` using the default print controller #76752
    area-System.Drawing
  • [build] Enable CodeQL with TSA #76751
  • Fold full-width SIMD-typed indirections #76745
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [mono][interp] Fix an issue with deopt and interpreter tiering. #76743
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • Vectorize (Last)IndexOfAny(Except) for ASCII needles #76740
    area-System.Memory, 8.0.0
  • enable regions for AoT #76737
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Fix loop canonicalization for call-finally case #76734
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Improve perf of Enumerable.Order{Descending} for primitives #76733
    area-System.Linq, tenet-performance, 8.0.0
  • Add doc describing well-known properties that the host can pass to the runtime #76732
    area-Host
  • Do not set flags for JTRUE op1 #76731
    area-CodeGen-coreclr

Merged

  • Use checked arithmetic when appending ICollection values to List<T> #76747
    area-System.Collections, 8.0.0
  • Fix for pipelines broken in #75473 #76758
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • [release/7.0] Ensure we cleanup the marshalling for elements of collections (stateful and stateless) #76693
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, 7.0.0
  • Add RIDs for Tizen 7.0 #76650
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-libraries, community-contribution
  • Properly handle filesizes larger than 8 Gb #76707
    area-System.IO, 8.0.0
  • Use CCKeyDerivationPBKDF on iOS #76688
    area-System.Security, os-ios
  • Make CodeSnippets tests more pluggable #76479
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator
  • Add readmes to reflection #76567
    documentation, area-System.Reflection, 8.0.0
  • Test and fix using AesCcm after disposal with OpenSSL #76577
    area-System.Security
  • Use AzDO Pipeline Resources to define our build Docker containers #75473
    area-Infrastructure
  • Remove GUID <=> string functions in PAL #76729
    area-VM-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Remove XmlConvert.StrEqual and use Span<char>.StartsWith() instead. #74955
    area-System.Xml, community-contribution
  • Make sure isRunSmokeTestsOnly is false when manually triggering runtime-extra-platforms #76715
  • Use normal VNs when adding NRE exception sets #76639
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [release/6.0] Delete dangling thread session states #76431
    Servicing-approved, EventPipe, area-Tracing-coreclr, 6.0.11
  • [wasm] Wasm.Build.Tests: Use the default cache for emcc #76694
    arch-wasm, test-enhancement, area-Build-mono
  • Don't cache the Compilation object in steps in the interop source generators #76474
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator
  • [mono] Add Vector128 Dot intrinsics for Amd64 #76239
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • low memory fixes #76468
    area-GC-coreclr
  • [release/7.0] Low memory fixes #76674
    Servicing-approved, area-GC-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • [release/7.0] [mono] Fix incorrect version comparison in loader #76698
    Servicing-approved, area-VM-meta-mono, 7.0.0
  • [Release/7.0] Delete dangling thread session states #76691
    Servicing-approved, EventPipe, area-Tracing-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • [release/6.0] Use new buildpools #76208
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [release/6.0] [mono] Fix incorrect version comparison in loader #76699
    Servicing-approved, area-VM-meta-mono, 6.0.11
  • Enable sourcelink in source-build #76685
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr

Updated

  • [JIT] Cleanup to lsra inspired by #73424 #76481
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • ActivatorUtilities not depending on ctor order for creating instances #75846
    area-Extensions-DependencyInjection
  • Require global opt-in for distributed transactions #76376
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Transactions, new-api-needs-documentation, linkable-framework, 7.0.0
  • Improvements to CoreCLR Building, Debugging, and Testing Documentation #75569
    documentation, area-Meta
  • Add non-generic Create method to DispatchProxy #73046
    area-System.Reflection, community-contribution, Future
  • Only R2R public methods, methods that override public methods, and internal methods that aren't always inlined #75793
    area-crossgen2-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Remove libstdc++ dependency from NativeAOT #76705
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [JIT] Cleanup, share more code between x86 and x64 in `genAllocLclFrame` #76647
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/7.0] Disable NativeAOT subset for source-build. #76206
    NO-MERGE, area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Devirtualize EqualityComparer for reference types #76714
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/6.0] Add RIDs for Tizen6.5 and 7.0 #76599
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, community-contribution
  • Don't check handles in substitution #76730
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • JIT: Preference locals away from PUTARG_REG killed registers #76671
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • API Dept - Microsoft.Extensions.Hosting #76692
    area-Extensions-Hosting
  • Use more spans in `System.Reflection.Metadata` et. al. #76574
    area-System.Reflection.Metadata, community-contribution
  • JIT: extend forward sub to handle adjacent assignments #75565
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add specific formatting string for SSA numbers #76706
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: Evaluate GDV call args early #75634
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Introduce a source generator for invoking methods on unmanaged vtables #68276
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator
  • Introduce WASM JITs for interpreter opcodes and interp_entry wrappers #76477
    NO-MERGE, arch-wasm, area-Codegen-meta-mono
  • JIT: import static readonly fields holding frozen objects as const handles #76112
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/6.0] Manually backporting #74599 #75648
    area-Serialization, 6.0.x
  • [mono] Add Vector128 Abs intrinsics for Amd64 #76668
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • [test][tvos] Disable InvalidIVSizes overflow case for tvos #76725
    area-System.Security, os-tvos
  • replace ToUtf8 with Encoding.UTF8.GetBytes #75834
    area-System.Text.Json, community-contribution, needs-author-action
  • Add debugger display for huge BigInteger #75796
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • [wasm] Implement next part of PackedSimd class #76539
    new-api-needs-documentation, 8.0.0
  • [wasm] Vector128's Sum and Dot SIMD implementation #76446
    arch-wasm, area-Codegen-LLVM-mono
  • [wasm] [debugger] First version of multithreaded debugging #74820
    area-Debugger-mono
  • Failfast on Vector256 test failure #76656
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Enable IDE0060 (Remove unused parameter) analyzer #72667
    area-Meta
  • Port SpanHelpers.SequenceCompareTo(ref byte, int, ref byte, int) to Vector128/256 #73475
    area-System.Memory, tenet-performance, 8.0.0
  • JIT: Streamline SIMD recognition #76613
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Implement AES-GCM with CryptoKit on macOS #76490
    area-System.Security
  • Arm64: Add If conversion pass #73472
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • Ensure source generated metadata properties are read-only. #76540
    area-System.Text.Json, new-api-needs-documentation, 8.0.0
  • New ASCII APIs #75012
    area-System.Buffers, new-api-needs-documentation, 8.0.0
  • [mono] Unify invoke code with coreclr #72717
    area-System.Reflection, 8.0.0
  • [mono][jit] Devirtualize ldarg(s)+callvirt where possible. #75748
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • Test Only - Less aggressive instrumentation for Vector256 crash #76701
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [Mono][Test] Collapse mono runtime tests into single builds using global-build-job template #62863
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Improve performance of integer formatting #76726
    area-System.Runtime

entry.title: dotnet/runtimelab - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-10-07
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • [Green Threads] JIT does not generate the new prolog #2015
  • [Green Threads] GC tracking in suspended threads is not enabled. If a GC occurs, there will be heap corruption #2011
  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Optimisation on compiling problem #1859

PullRequests

Created

  • Conservative GC reporting for suspended green threads #2022
  • Instrument Socket for green threads #2021
  • Instrument RandomAccess.Read/Write for green threads #2020

Updated

  • Make FCall transition go through lambda that can be translated into a functionpointer + pointer arg parameter #2019
  • NativeAOT-LLVM: Add support for GT_STORE_BLK #2005
  • NativeAOT-LLVM: Turn on optimisation in RyuJit module, partial support for FIELD_LIST and lowering promoted fields #2007

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-10-07
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • dotnet publish -p:PublishProfile=ClickOnceProfile error #28403
  • global.json is ignored if cwd is out of project or solution directory #28399

PullRequests

Created

  • [ForwardPort] 8.0 Breaking Changes #28412
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Add PackageDependenciesDesignTime to cache assets file #28405
  • [release/7.0.1xx] backport APICompat changes for GA #28404
    Servicing-consider, Area-ApiCompat
  • Add an official builder assembly attribute #28400
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.1xx' => 'release/7.0.2xx' #28398
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.2xx' => 'main' #28397
    Area-Infrastructure
  • ResolveReadyToRunCompilers: map non-portable rids when targetOS is determined. #28380
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Make Apps RID Specific By Default & RID Now FDD By Default in 8.0+ #28376
    Review for breaking changes

Merged

  • [release/7.0.1xx] Disable msbuild server by default #28369
    Servicing-approved, Area-CLI, 7.0.0
  • Fix checking for updated workload packs in advertising manifests #28327
    Servicing-approved, Area-Workloads
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.1xx' => 'release/7.0.2xx' #28392
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.2xx' => 'main' #28366
    Area-Infrastructure

Updated

  • Update branding to 6.0.111 #28322
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 2014793 #27667
  • Add --ucr shorthand for --use-current-runtime #27971
    Area-CLI, Priority:3, cli-ux
  • Add Description to Workload --info #27973
    Area-CLI, Priority:3, cli-ux

entry.title: dotnet/csharplang - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-10-07
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • namespace internal access modifier #2497

PullRequests

Merged

  • Disallow global using static with file types #6517

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-10-07
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Magical semi-colon teleportation in Visual Studio #64577
  • Error reported annotating ref parameter with [UnscopedRef] #64569
  • Uncomment `[ContentType("text")]` attribute and unskip integration test #64567
    17.5 P1

Closed

  • Test plan for "file types" #60819
    17.4
  • `nint` is not allowed in operators defined on `IntPtr` #53306
    17.4
  • Using `KeyValuePair<,>` can result in null reference runtime errors which are not caught by the compiler #64467
  • Intermittent compiler error `error CS1617: Invalid option '11.0' for /langversion.` using Microsoft.Net.Compilers.Toolset #64437
  • Compiler needs to declaratively fail when loading newer analyzers #61252
    17.4
  • Could not load System.Collections.Immutable #63780
    17.4
  • StringSyntaxAttribute for params arguments only highlight the first argument #64463
  • `CSharpStructuredTriviaFormatEngine` should probably derive from `CSharpFormatEngine` instead of `AbstractFormatEngine` #64546
  • VS2022 C# cannot remove IDE0220 code style warnings #64289

PullRequests

Created

  • [LSP] Fix race during shutdown and exit #64583
    Area-IDE, LSP
  • Update NavigateTo tests to support AllInOneSearch #64582
    Area-IDE
  • Disable Windows PDB conversion #64581
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Enable rich LSIF hover information. #64580
    Area-IDE
  • Utility for uploading artifact on test failure #64578
    Area-Compilers
  • Experiment: Use IAsyncEnumerable in OOP calls. #64576
    Area-IDE
  • Treat *.g.i.cs|vb files as design-time-only in EnC #64575
    Area-Interactive, Interactive-EnC, 17.4 P4
  • Nullable enable ISymbol.ContainingSymbol #64570
    Area-Compilers
  • Do not expose C# member semantic models directly to external consumers. #64568
    Area-Compilers
  • Adjust CSharpStructuredTriviaFormatEngine inheritance #64566
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Check value scopes match in ref reassignment #64561
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Ref Fields

Merged

  • Simplify SymbolKey implementation #64565
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Publish pr validation packages #64554
    Area-Infrastructure, Next
  • Revert "Remove unused TS brace completion code" #64574
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Enable diagnostics token tor solution crawler in code action test #64557
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #64579
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Cherry-picking perfepic commits back into main #64572
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.4 to main #64573
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Publish additional packages to vssdk feed #64571
    Area-Infrastructure, Next
  • Simpler bidirectional streaming invocation in OOP. #64494
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Set starting size for changed text builder using old text #64379
    Area-Compilers
  • Add symbol key tests #64420
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #64564
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Remove assert that fires for old CodeStyle NuGet packages #64532
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #64562
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Update publish data to test PR validation fix #64559
    Area-Infrastructure, Next

Updated

  • Build and run tests on .NET 7 #64560
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #64584
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Catch deconstruction ref escape errors in invocation escape analysis #64470
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Ref Fields
  • Set val escape on expression variables #64414
    Area-Compilers
  • Add ChecksumAlgorithm to project snapshot #62840
    Area-IDE
  • Support `scoped` keyword in declaration expressions. #64380
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Ref Fields
  • Remove exportProvider parameter from TestWorkspace ctor #64221
    Area-IDE
  • Fix regex detection for StringSyntax attribute on params parameters #64553
    Area-IDE
  • Beef up resiliency of DeclareAsNullable fixer #64555
    Area-IDE
  • Test the EditorFeatures layer on net472 and net6.0-windows #61234
    Area-IDE, 17.5 P2
  • Use required members for option types #64405
    Area-IDE
  • Add support for code refactorings and code fixes in non-source files #64364
    Area-Analyzers
  • Extend test coverage for lambda default parameters #64530
    Area-Compilers
  • Don't format regions inside inactive conditionals #64551
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Caller of an async local function cannot expect any of the callee’s code to execute #64482
    Area-Compilers
  • Load CompletionProvider from references in background #64352
    Area-IDE

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-10-07
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Blazor API route issue with a parameter named {Action} #44422
  • Perf regression: json #44419
  • Perf improvement: json, plainTextWithFilter #44418
  • Quarantine OutputFlowControl_ConnectionAndRequestAborted_NoException #44415
  • Perf regression: fortunes_actix, json_actix #44410

Closed

  • Port tunneling doesn't work with Blazor #44414
  • Remove ResponseCookies._enableCookieNameEncoding compat switch #44396
  • Better logs for not succeeded policy authentication schemes #43861
    8.0-preview1
  • Server Variables and Request Headers mutually exclusive in ASP.NET Core+ #44330
  • TestHost response body does not support 0-byte reads #41692
    6.0.11
  • [SignalR] constantly reconnecting, timeout setting issue #44197
  • .NET 7 RC1 "dotnet new grpc" creates a project that references a package which is not compatible with .NET 7 #44367
  • [Blazor] Isolated CSS is not entirely isolated #44387
  • Perf improvement: connectionclose #44376
  • Perf regression: json, plaintext_netty #44377
  • [Docs] More detail for `Microsoft.AspNetCore.Http.ConnectionInfo.RemoteIpAddress` #40191
    .NET 8 Planning

PullRequests

Created

  • update triageprocess.md for .NET 8 #44421
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0' => 'main' #44416
    area-infrastructure, Type: Merge Forward :fast_forward:
  • [Blazor] Update bind:set,after runtime apis #44412
    Servicing-approved, area-blazor
  • Avoid double dispatch by default on HTTP.sys #44409
    area-runtime

Merged

  • Quarantine OutputFlowControl_ConnectionAndRequestAborted_NoException #44417
    area-runtime, 8.0-preview1
  • Remove CookieNameEncoding #44407
    area-runtime, 8.0-preview1
  • Better logs in AuthorizationMiddleware #43862
    area-security, community-contribution, 8.0-preview1
  • Standard stream argument validation #44405
    area-runtime, 8.0-preview1
  • [release/7.0] Fix components-e2e pipeline #44406
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode
  • Improve documentation of ConnectionInfo.RemoteIpAddress #44370
    area-runtime, 8.0-preview1

Updated

  • StringUtilities with xplat-intrinsics (and a little perf-tuning) #44040
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 1159: Build ID 2014655 #43956
    blocked, area-infrastructure

entry.title: dotnet/diagnostics - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-10-07
entry.content:
PullRequests

Updated

  • [Dotnet Monitor] Standardize DiagnosticFilterString, No Longer Assume TraceEvent Arg Ordering #3425

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-10-07
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Documentation for Geolocation returning null missing #10562
  • [Android] If MainPage overrides OnBackButtonPressed, OnBackButtonPressed and Android back button stop being called for other pages #10561
  • Massive memory leak in CollectionView while scrolling #10560
  • nothing #10559
  • Page class - protected virtual bool OnBackButtonPressed() contains no documentation #10558
  • [Android] returning false or not calling base code in OnBackButtonPressed in Page does not prevent back button from working #10557
  • [Android] ConfigureLifecycleEvents OnBackPressed sample from documentation does not compile #10555
  • VisualDiagnostics.RegisterSourceInfo returns null if debugger is not attached #10554
  • LineBreakMode cannot be used on a button on Windows #10553
    Backlog
  • Unexpected result with MaximumWidthRequest on a Label on Android #10552
    Backlog
  • Essentials Permissions.ShouldShowRationale<Permissions.LocationWhenInUse> never returns true on Android 12 #10551
  • How can I troubleshoot why my android device stops appearing in the VS 2022 list of 'Android Local Devices' #10548
  • Searchhandler causes App crash when Text changes on iOS #10547
  • FlexLayout doesn't work #10546
    Backlog
  • MauiImage not displayed in bind prop if no classic Image with svg source in same page #10545
  • [Bug] ModalStack is broken (PushModalAsync, PopModalAsync [Android]) (Remove Page [All Platform]) #10543
  • Use BindableProperty on a self contained component #10542
  • [Android] Layout changes are not rendered without triggering a render cycle via interaction with UI #10539
    Backlog
  • InvalidCastException when using recommended ViewRenderer<TView, TNativeView> #10537
  • ListView selection issue #10536
    Backlog
  • WebAuthenticator Broken on iOS15 #10534
    .NET 7 Planning
  • Issue going back to the root page on Windows #10533
    Backlog

Closed

  • Inline docs requirements #3936
  • [MacCatalyst] Scroll not working in ScrollView #10474
    7.0
  • We need controls like WPF frame #9538
  • MAUI iOS doesn't work on EFCore 7 #9550
  • Connecting to SqlServer errors #10111
  • Couldn't run the emulator #10527
  • MAUI app terminates immediately with Syncfusion controls (Q3 version) #10535
  • Operation is not supported on this platform. when using HttpClient.send on ios and android #10470
  • .NET MAUI button backgroundcolor dosen't work #10172
  • Changing BaseSize attribute of MauiSplashScreen element within a project does not get picked up #6600
    Backlog
  • .NET MAUI App Icon and Splash screen cannot be customized #10079
  • Add Support for WinUI Unpackaged Apps #3166
    7.0
  • [iOS] Attempting to JIT compile method InitializeComponent while running in aot-only mode. #7396

PullRequests

Created

  • Make Grid of spacing consistent when rows/columns are collapsed #10556
  • iOS15 WindowStateManager Window Support #10550
    community ✨
  • [Housekeeping] Including "real apps samples" in the Gallery #10544
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Bump Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.CSharp from 4.2.0 to 4.3.1 #10541
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Bump Xamarin.GooglePlayServices.Maps from 118.0.2.2 to 118.1.0 #10540
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Fix essentials samples XAML #10538
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/essentials 🍞, 7.0
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #10532
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️

Merged

  • Add inline code documentation guidelines #10465
    area/docs 📓, t/housekeeping ♻︎

Updated

  • Don't fire appearing/disappearing with window #10530
    area/lifecycle 🔁
  • Fix catalyst secondary click to match windows #10525
    platform/macOS 🍏
  • Generate a more complete splash screen drawable set for Android #10516
    area/single project ☝️, 7.0
  • [Android] Implement PointerGestureRecognizer for Android #10352
    area/gestures

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-10-07
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Strange issue with ef 5 on windows 11 dotnet ef stoped working, #29296
  • Configure an owned entity in order to have one to many relationship with an abstract class #29294
  • Best practice for entities synchronization and migration between multiple micro services which share entities #29293
  • Parameterized DbContext for Global query filter with Entity Type Configuration documentation improvement #29291
  • Remove-Migration Initialization String validation different from Add-Migration #29290
  • JSON/Query: don't print JSON_QUERY calls when we extract the entire aggregate #29289
  • JSON/Query: translate groupby followed by orderby json scalar + FirstOrDefault #29287

Closed

  • EF7 - GroupBy on Json column property + First/FirstOrDefault generates incorrect SQL #29279
    7.0.0
  • DateTime.Now not consistent with client and server with different time zone #29284
  • Use custom converter results in duplicate resulting column names #29265
  • Best way to execute (non query) command in RelationalDatabaseCreator #29292
  • Reverse split mapping for owned type throws cycle error in save changes #29104
    7.0.0
  • Optional dependents and entity splitting #29079
    7.0.0
  • JSON/Query: optimize casts to nvarchar(max) in json queries where possible #29267

PullRequests

Merged

  • [release/7.0] Fix to #29279 - EF7 - GroupBy on Json column property + First/FirstOrDefault generates incorrect SQL #29288
    Servicing-approved, 7.0.0

entry.title: dotnet/installer - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-10-07
entry.content:
PullRequests

Created

  • Add dotnet root to the env script #14694
  • Add a prototype telemetry setting test. #14693
  • Update asp.net templates #14690
  • [7.0.1xx] Update asp.net templates #14689
  • [6.0.4xx] Update asp.net templates #14688
  • [6.0.3xx] Update asp.net templates #14687
  • [6.0.1xx] Update asp.net templates #14686
  • Remove questionable license cleanup logic #14681

Merged

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.1xx' => 'release/7.0.2xx' #14691

Updated

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.2xx' => 'main' #14677
  • [release/6.0.1xx] Arm support #13378
  • Adding ppc64le arch for source build #14631
  • [main] Add support for arm platform #14470
  • [release/7.0.1xx] Add ARM platform support #14592
  • Don't use the MSBuild server process for init-build.proj. #14643
